he could launch a bid for higher office. Mike Pence will speak in the Indiana State House Tuesday afternoon about the need for a more limited government and the importance of state government. This nation faces serious challenges that will require us to renew our commitment to institutions resilient enough to lead America back, he will say, according to prepared remarks." I believe those are the institutions of faith, family, community and state government. To renew our nation we must have a renewal of American federalism."

Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 White House race." I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified," he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either.
